articles.title: Crosby celebrates with Canadian men’s soccer team after Copa America victory - NHL.com
articles.description: Nova Scotia native supports hometown soccer team
articles.content: The Canadians took a 1-0 lead in the 13th minute before Venezuela tied the game late. The game eventually went to penalty kicks where Canadians took the win to advance to the semi-finals. Then Crosby… [+293 chars]

articles.author: Steve Almasy, Nouran Salahieh
articles.title: Record-setting heat will continue to torment millions of Americans this weekend - CNN
articles.description: The weekend is off to a sizzling start as more than one-third of US residents face heat advisories and additional cities are expected to see record temperatures Saturday.
articles.content:
The weekend is off to a sizzling start as more than one-third of US residents face heat advisories and additional cities are expected to see record temperatures in the coming days.
